import React from 'react' import './RecipeDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import star_icon_dull from '../assets/velikonocni-cupcaky.jpg' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../../context/ShopContext' const RecipeDisplay = (props) => { const {recipe}= props; return (

{props.name}

(122)

Category: {props.category}

{props.preparation_time} min
Počet porcí: {props.servings}
{console.log(props.name)}
) } export default RecipeDisplay
